I tried contacting customer support by email.  The email was returned as undeliverable.  Tried calling the customer support line.  There is no identifying greeting, only goes on hold with music.

I want to revise my review of PC Masters who are selling Microsoft Office Suite 2021 software and the activation codes. The 2cd set of activation codes also did not work. The trick is to get one of their tech people on the phone (not thru a chat box) and work with them until the issue is solved and the Office product is working. I am a satisfied customer now.

Review.Titre: I purchased MS Office and was given a useless product and they have not returned my funds
Review.Contenu: I purchased MS Office and was given a activation code and product key.  I was unable to activate the software - when I called Microsoft for help, they told me that the codes had been exhausted and I should request a fresh one or demand a refund.  I have asked for the refund 3 times and have not been given one.  I will be launching a fraud investigation to get my money back.  DO NOT BUY from this company. They do not stand behind their products.

Review.Titre: Windows failed to activate even after…

Review.Titre: Failure to find a solution. Technicians were outstanding in their effort to find a solution …
Review.Contenu: The technicians did an astounding job of trying to get the OS windows 10 installed on my computer. I give them a ten. Unfortunately they could not get it installed they worked about 6 hrs. But the fact that they could not find a solution is why it is a 1 star for failure to solve the problem The website indicates that if a solution cannot be found then a refund will be given. I expect a full refund but another customer indicated they take 20% off and she is still waiting for the refund. Is this false advertising?

RE: Order 1573I have been waiting for 10-days to get the Windows 10 PRO that I ordered on 2022-12-01.  To date I have not received any notification of the DVD having been shipped!My shipping address is as follows:6210 Belcrest Road Apartment 1330Hyattsville, MD 20782-2969.

Review.Titre: After purchase I worked with an agent…

After several emails into them and a phone call I finally was told they would give me 80 percent back and the other 20 would be to cover their online costs?? I never used the product and it’s not up to me to make their business continue. Also nowhere on their refund policy does it say “ oh by the way we will always need 20 percent to do business” lol. Still haven’t seen a refund.

I was sold a windows product key that was invalid. I asked for a refund and now I'm in the loop. I'll accept that I'm just out $30. Now i'm hoping my card information isn't going to be used by this company, or any affiliates, in the future.

Review.Titre: The ordering process was simple & Customer Support was fant

Entered the code in the activation window and about 15 seconds (!!)later W10Pro was activated: No contact with Microsoft nor PC Masters was needed.   I am not really used to this EXCELLENT level of service.

bought a windows key and it didn't work but it was easily resolved thanks to Angel in chat.  excellent service I will be buying from PC masters again.

(OH NO!)I messaged the chat which was already at the corner with the issue and my order verification number. Glenn responded IMMEDIATELY and in language that I instantly knew I was talking to a person and not a bot. He was kind, walked me through each step, made phone calls for me. In TWELVE minutes he had me up and running. I don't expect busness to go perfectly every time. (I also seem to be the person that things never work as intented on so I have a lot of experience dealing with customer service.)The integrity of a company and the individuals working for a company is really shown when there are problems. Glenn made my "problem" a minor hiccup. Because of that, I'll be back for any of my future needs.

Product is exactly as the stated in the ad at the greatest price. Had an issue installing the product and when I contacted them online they talked me through the process and even did some of the steps for me. The whole process took about 10 minutes.
Great job. Had issue with activation then call the hotline and boom! problem solved. Thank you so much! Will be back for another purchase.
Download and installation was easy. We needed help with Office activation on two machines. Kathleen was patient and very helpful. SUCCESS!
Easy to purchase a license.  Had trouble getting one to install properly, and the chat feature helped get that accomplished.  Excellent experience and top notch customer support.

Purchased and installed Office 2021 Home and Student Lifetime License. Download was smooth and quick, however, I am unable to print any of the things I have typed. Everything goes to "SAVE". And even after this I am unable to open item to print. Help

Review.Titre: I could not download the product I…
Review.Contenu: I could not download the product I bought.  After, getting help from several people, 3 phone calls to Pcmasters, the problem was found and finally I had peace! Thank you

Review.Titre: so i wasn't really expecting live chat…
Review.Contenu: so i wasn't really expecting live chat at this time of night.  it was like 9pm et.  i was going to leave an email but there was live chat.  it took like an hour to fix my pc.  the guys hourly rate must have been more than what i paid for the software.  yet he fixed it.  after going back and forth he asked if he could do remote and within like 10 mins he had my pc running. amazing service.
Had a minor issue getting my product to activate but they fixed the issue within a few hours  very happy
Excellent support!  From Star in particular.  I ran into a small issue and they solved it the same day.  Highly recommend

Helpful Staff and Great PricesI purchased Office 2019 . The customer service folks where very quick to respond to my inquiries and to help with resolving issues relating to the download and installation. It was a good experience and I actually purchased another download for another computer. Happy Customer! Thank you Pcmasters!

Review.Titre: Called Support and got a new product…
Review.Contenu: Called Support and got a new product key. The person stayed on the phone until I got the klaptop activated.Very helpful and great customer support.
Purchased Windows 10, it's a good buy, and the key works perfectly. I was amazed that their live technical support operates
I had an issue with windows 10 key that didn't activate. I reached out to customer service and they were super responsive on contacting me back and resolving my issue!

I experienced some trouble while installing (got an error code that said this code has been activated on another computer), but when I reached out for a refund a customer representative was able to provide me instructions on how to succeed in the activation (had to do a short phone call with Microsoft). Great customer support, and on a Sunday too!

Review.Titre: The lady I talked with this morning was…
Review.Contenu: The lady I talked with this morning was excellent and solved the problem quickly after I explained what had happened the evening before.  I was very pleased.

Review.Titre: I purchased a license for Windows 10…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a license for Windows 10 Professional. I called and received expert instruction on how to get it activated. Excellent service.
Highly recommended!The product was delivered through email instantly.The program is working well and the support is so responsive and knowledgeable!

Review.Titre: was fast and easy and i see no charges…
Review.Contenu: was fast and easy and i see no charges on my card other than what i ordered. i ask them a few things they gave me a answer and it all worked as they said so all is good

Review.Titre: A few teething issues with the product…
Review.Contenu: A few teething issues with the product key, took two phone calls to sort it out, but the techs worked quickly and professionally. All is well. Will purchase from again!

Review.Titre: Service was great and the issue I had…
Review.Contenu: Service was great and the issue I had was resolved immediately. Instructions were provided very straight forward. Excellent service.

Review.Titre: I easily found the solution to my…
Review.Contenu: I easily found the solution to my problem.

Review.Titre: Their service department is the best ever. Great job guys and thanks.
Review.Contenu: They worked very hard to get my service up and going. I thought I had bought a program and was going to get stiffed with it. But when I contacted them they were right there to help me get up and running. They have a great staff and I want to say thank you to everyone that helped me. Great group of people. The best help I have ever gotten when I bought a online product.
Item is as described. Works perfectly. Fast shipping will definitely use this seller again.
After my computer failed mid boot I was expecting the worst, but CS was very responsive and helpful in getting my new program reinstalled.
